General.Name: Pool Advista Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT. Pool Advista Indonesia Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides investment, financial, and business consulting services primarily in Indonesia. It also provides consumer finance, securities trading brokerage, and life insurance services; and operates as an investment manager. The company was formerly known as PT. Pool Asuransi Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT. Pool Advista Indonesia Tbk in November 2003. PT. Pool Advista Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Block CC6 No.9 - 10, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12210
